text: Rabbi Elie Kaunfer is president and CEO at the Hadar Institute in Manhattan.Huffington Post, Chilean Miner Rescue, Celebration Gives New Meaning to Old Prayers, October 19, 2010 http://www.huffingtonpost.com/rabbi-elie- kaunfer/chilean-miner-rescue-give_b_765889.html He is the co-author with Jonathan Sarna of Empowered Judaism (2010), a book that explores independent minyanim and building Jewish communities.Jewish Journal, The Jew Revolution, April 26, 2010 http://www.jewishjournal.com/books/article/rabbi_elie_kaunfers_empowered_judaism_challenges_the_institution_20100426/ ==References== Category:American Conservative Jews Category:Living people Category:Conservative rosh yeshivas Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Elie Kaunfer
